alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:25AM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence County, mainly south of New York Route 3. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery road conditions possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of lake effect snow will develop later today bringing light to moderate snowfall to southeastern St. Lawrence County. Snowfall rates up to 1/2 inch per hour may be possible. Greatest accumulations will be south of New York Route 3. Snowfall will gradually diminish this evening as the band of snow moves south out of the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
